properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 8 at 7:10AM ChST until January 10 at 5:00PM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
properties.description:
* WHAT...DANGEROUS AND FREQUENT RIP CURRENTS.

* WHERE...ALONG EAST FACING REEFS OF THE MARIANA ISLANDS.

* WHEN...THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON.

* IMPACTS...RIP CURRENTS CAN SWEEP EVEN THE BEST SWIMMERS AWAY
FROM SHORE INTO DEEPER WATER.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...AT CERTAIN BEACHES...SUCH AS RITIDIAN AND GUN
AT GUAM...THE HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS COULD EXTEND TO NORTH
FACING REEFS.
properties.instruction:
EXPERIENCED SWIMMERS SHOULD SWIM NEAR A LIFEGUARD IF POSSIBLE...AND
NEVER SWIM ALONE. INEXPERIENCED SWIMMERS SHOULD STAY OUT OF THE
WATER...ESPECIALLY ALONG EAST FACING REEFS. IF CAUGHT IN A RIP
CURRENT...RELAX AND FLOAT. DON'T SWIM AGAINST THE CURRENT. IF ABLE...
SWIM IN A DIRECTION FOLLOWING THE SHORELINE. IF UNABLE TO ESCAPE...
FACE THE SHORE AND CALL OR WAVE FOR HELP.

NWSheadline: HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS ALONG EAST FACING REEFS THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
